system.description: The character can designate priority targets for coordinated fire, allowing bonded allies to strike with devastating effect.
system.benefit: The character can spend a Fate Point to make a +0 Ballistic Skill Test as a Full Action. If they succeed, they choose a single target within range, that unit is marked for one round, +1 per Degree of Success on test. Allied Tau characters that hit the target with ranged attacks can roll twice for damage and choose the higher result.

prerequisites.text: Tau, Ballistic Skill 45, Furious Fusillade, Command +20

rollConfig.description: BS test to mark target for coordinated fire

specialAbilities.name: Target Marking
specialAbilities.description: Spend Fate Point and Full Action. Make BS test to mark target for 1 round (+1 per DoS). Allied Tau roll damage twice and take higher result.
